dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:21,500. Oriented with north toward the left. Appears in: General atlas. London: published under the superintendence of the Society for the Diffusion of Useful Knowledge [by] George Cox, [1853]. Views below map: Writers buildings -- Government house -- Esplanade Row. Includes list of references to public buildings, churches and chapels. 170
24 x 41 centimeters, on sheet 37 x 43 centimeters
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dct_creator_sm: Society for the Diffusion of Useful Knowledge (Great Britain)
dct_publisher_sm: published under the superintendence of the Society for the Diffusion of Useful Knowledge by George Cox ; London
